captions.text:
You don't feel anything 
when I touch you like this?
Right?

Do you think I'm some kind 
of shelter made with marble?
I’m all about all about
I’m all about all about

As if I’m bewitched by happiness 
In my heart

Pain inside my heart 
Rain inside my tears

You were the my only one 
To hug those away
Love like destiny

Say bye bye to the memories that were 
Sad like the shadow

You are Oh shiny star 
Do you feel the tremble

My heart captured in darkness 
Shining light in my heart

I keep falling in to you Holic
You melt in to me

I bloom in your dream 
This time is My paradise

I’m all about all about 
I’m all about all about

As if I’m bewitched by happiness 
In my heart

Pain inside my heart 
Rain inside my tears

You were the my only one 
To hug those away

Do you Oh make me smile 
Feel this tremble

Your breath on the cheeks 
Oh when we brush by
I’m shy like a rose

I keep falling in to you Holic
You melt in to me

I bloom in your dream 
 
This time is My paradise

I’m all about all about 
I’m all about all about

As if I’m bewitched by happiness 
In my heart

Pain inside my heart 
Rain inside my tears

You were the my only one 
To hug those away

Oh I want to give 
you my everything

To meet again someday with you 
Fly~Fly~High

I’m all about all about 
I’m all about all about

I have the world with me 
My heart is sha lala

Now no more pain 
In my heart no more pain

You are my only one with 
The sunshine in it
Love like a present

Like in a sweet dream 
forever with you
